pr_title: BXC-2471 - Destroy action cleans up external files

timeline.message: Refactor destroy action into a camel task. Add test for destroy service. Split acl service initialization into its own context for tests"
Add method to delete files from storage locations
Destroy action cleans up external binaries for original files. Normalizing external binary uris to only have :/ instead of :/// for file uris, since fedora does this to the uris
Clear objects from solr index after they are destroyed

timeline.bodyText: Don't delete the binaries until the fedora cleanup has been successful, otherwise the rollback can result in objects with missing files.
timeline.author: bbpennel

timeline.message: Defer binary cleanup until after fedora destroy transaction completes
Skip binary destruction if the uri array is empty
